title: Style: Alec Mather – Back In The Days
body:
“Back in the days “ is a new shoot that stylist Alec Mather and photographer Ruth Ginika Ossai put together for the website Sweet and Sound.

A style website which shows a lot of undertone very un-glamorized work. But instead concentrates something a lot more like street style. The shoot reflects a playground street style, which would look at home in late 80s Brixton life. Both stylist and photographer study at UCA, so I hope to see more from them in the future.
